Line 54: Line 54:
==Athletics==
==Athletics==
  +
[[Image:IndianaTechSpiritMark.jpg|thumb|right|Athletics logo]]
The university is a member of the [[Wolverine-Hoosier Athletic Conference]] in the [[National Association of Intercollegiate Athletics]]. The Warriors have 17 intercollegiate athletic programs: men's and women's [[basketball]], men's [[baseball]], women's [[softball]], men's and women's [[soccer]], women's [[volleyball]], men's and women's [[tennis]], men's and women's golf, men's and women's cross country, men's and women's lacrosse, and men's and women's track and field. In addition, the university offers several [[intramural]] sports.
The university is a member of the [[Wolverine-Hoosier Athletic Conference]] in the [[National Association of Intercollegiate Athletics]]. The Warriors have 17 intercollegiate athletic programs: men's and women's [[basketball]], men's [[baseball]], women's [[softball]], men's and women's [[soccer]], women's [[volleyball]], men's and women's [[tennis]], men's and women's golf, men's and women's cross country, men's and women's lacrosse, and men's and women's track and field. In addition, the university offers several [[intramural]] sports.
